entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -2.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
